attributes.action: Make PRESCRIPTION CHARGES equal throughout the U.K.
attributes.additional_details: The NHS is the NATIONAL Health Service so prescription costs should be the same nationally. People living in England pay the same national insurance as people living in Scotland so why should we then have to pay £7.40 Per Item on top of that, for the same drugs, for the same illnesses? We call on the governement to scrap the most blatant post code lottery of them all and bring back a fairer, equal GREAT Britain.
